But again there only 5 people in the room, those being the area leaders of the group, Janet, Brandi, Tara, Christa and Maria.

The large women quickly dismantled the bufett set-up and then took their seats as the President of th NAALW, Janet, stood in front of the podium with a broad smile. Janet a very large woman about 6'2" with large breasts and butt wearing a tight blouse with a very short business skirt.

"I'm glad you could all make it, before we get started, even though it seems redundant and pointless I have to follow procedure, so first things first. Attendance. Southern Division Representative."

"I'm here y'all" Brandi says standing up, she's wearing a button-down cowboy shirt that is much too tight only buttoning up half-way showing her tight green bra. She's wearing her hair in pigtails under a cowboy hat and daisy duke shorts that her butt is hanging out of.

Janet smiles looking at all the ladies, "Well I'm very happy to have you all here, Today is truly a monumental day, because it is the day that we, the large women of the world, take our rightful place being in charge of everybody else" She says smiling while the other women are still confused.

"I thought you'd never ask" Janet says smiling reaching into a briefcase.

11111.content:
"Girls!" exclaimed Janet. "Calm yourselves. You'll all get the chance to have your own slave. Just be patient."

The girls huffed and sighed, except Christa, who finds the decision fair. She doesn't care if she gets the little man or not. It's just her timid and kind nature. However, she does want to make a stand against those who teased her for being a giant freak. But this poor guy seemed rather intimidated by them, even before he was shrunk down.

"Now personally, I would like my own little man pet. My dogs need a good rub," she stated, rubbing her feet in her sandals, which, like most of her clothing, was much to big for her. "But I believe that Christa deserves it more than me."

The other girls were shocked and outraged.

"Christa!?" exclaimed Tara. "Why does she get him and not any of us!?"

"Because she didn't try to fight over it like you three did," explained the leader of the NAALW.

"But she doesn't even know how to treat him properly!" snapped Maria. "She's gonna just coddle him like a little doll!"

"An' besides," added Brandi. "These shorties aughta pay for makin' fun of us!"

"I am well aware of the situation and that is out plan. But I remember a man who actually stood up for me. And this guy kinda reminds me of him."

The girls looked at her, surprised. "You did? Who?"

"Well...it was a long while ago. When I was 12, I was living in an apartment in uptown New York City. There was a boy across the hall around my age, black hair, brown eyes, awfully smaller than most boys. But maybe that was just my perspective. He could wear my boobs as a hat when both of us were standing up straight. We actually got along very well and became close friends. He even stood up for me in front of his friends. But almost a year later, he moved away. His parents had a new job downtown and, well, he left me, even though if he didn't want to. I never saw him since."

The girls were shocked and didn't know what to say. "Wow...what was his name?" asked Christa.

"Thomas." she said. "Thomas O'Riley."

The shrunken man suddenly seemed to take interest. "Thomas O'Riley? I know a guy named that! And he looks just like how you described him!"

"Really?" asked Janet, surprised. "Are you sure?"

"Yeah! He lives a few doors down from my place. I can take you there if you like!"

"Whoa whoa whoa!" interrupted Maria. "Are you gonna believe this guy? He could be lying!"

"Yeah! Let's crush him under our feet!" agreed Tara.

"Wait!" cried out the shy Asian. "Maybe you should go...I mean, it may be your long lost friend."

"Okay, but still, what's the story with the little guy?"

"What do you mean?"

"Well, what should we do with him? Should Christa keep a hold of him while Janet runs off and finds this guy? Or should he come with him?"

It wasn't her fault she was so big.

11111211.content:
A loud rumble from Christa’s belly signaled her answer. “Well, I could go for a bite to eat.” She looked around to see that the room had been completely devoid of food from the girls’ previous feast. “Wait, Andy, can you get me the number for ‘Antonio’s Family Pizzeria?’”

Andy nodded, seeing where this was going. He called up the restaurant and ordered 25 Hot-and-Ready Extra large pizzas with two 2-liter bottles of Coca-Cola. As the hotel was conveniently located near the restaurant, the food was delivered in a timely fashion – 9 minutes, to be exact. It was just in time too, because Christa’s tummy was roaring louder than a lion. After paying for the meal, Christina sat down at one of the specially reinforced chair capable of supporting any one head member of the NAALW and laid the pizza boxes and soda bottles on the table.

“Christa, I’ve been meaning to ask, how much do you weigh?” Andrew asked.

The Japanese-American looked puzzled. “I don’t know actually.” She admitted. “The last time that I checked, my weight was 510 pounds, but that was a long time ago.”

“Well, don’t you want to see if you’ve gotten bigger?” Andy questioned.

Christine mused over this for a bit before nodding. She heaved herself out of her chair and walked to get a scale big enough for the head members to see the weight over their bellies. The device was activated and Christina stepped onto it, waiting nervously for the number to stop moving. When it did so, the results made her elated.

“I hit 530 pounds!” She squealed. “That’s only 10 pounds behind Maria!”

“That’s great!” Andy agreed. “So, you’re close to being the fattest, right?”

That comment abruptly stopped the woman’s moment of triumph, replace it with one of disappointment. “No, I’m not even close. You see, I’m 23 and am still the smallest at 530 pounds and 6’ 1” tall. Maria is 19, but is 540 pounds and 6’ 4”. Tara is 32 and is 600 pounds and 6’ 6”. Janet is 33 and is 698 pounds and 6’ 2”. Brandi is 28 and is 720 pounds and 6’ 7”, so she’s the largest of us all.”

The 3’ 6”-tall man stood silent utterly shocked that any human could be so large. He was originally 5’ 6” before getting shrunk, so he was already shorter than all of them, but now, he could only reach up to Christa’s blubber belly, so she still rather intimidated him. Christa noticed this and smiled at him assuredly. “Don’t worry, we’re all gentle giantesses. It’s just that society treats us horribly, all because we’re larger than everyone else. Our organization is like a family, especially the other heads and I. I’m an only child, but I consider them my surrogate big sisters, literally and figuratively, and they feel the same way about me.”

“T-that’s really sweet.” He replied.

“Thanks, but if you don’t mind, I’d like to get started on my lunch right about now.” The BBW stated, waddling toward her chair and opening a pizza box. Her mouth watered at the sight of the steaming discs of baked whole wheat bread dough, red and yellow tomato sauce, shredded mozzarella cheese, grated Parmesan and Romano cheese, minced garlic, crushed red pepper, small yellow chopped summer squash, small chopped zucchini, and stuffed pretzel crust.

Andy climbed onto another chair to get a better look at the food and took noticed of something. “There’s no meat on this.”

Again, Christa giggled. “Surprised, aren’t you? Janet and I are vegetarians. We can't eat anything with a face and I feel sorry that she’s missing out on this. Though as you can see, that doesn’t automatically mean that a person stays thin because of it.” She grinned and grabbed her gut for emphasis, giggling the pillow of fat that was split horizontally into two equally flabby rolls.

“Well, let’s not waste any more time and fill you up.” Andy said.

“I agree.” Christa replied and began tearing into her meal, displaying a level of ferocity that belied her mousy personality.

Andy decided to help feed her, pushing whatever slices he could grab into her mouth. She moaned in delighted as the piping hot pies passed though her lips. Once all eight slices of the first pizza entered Christa’s stomach, they discarded the box and opened the next one, allowing them to repeat the process. After the 12th pizza vanished, Christa was parched. Andrew unscrewed a Coke bottle and fed it to Christine like a baby. She chugged vigorously until she drained the plastic container of its carbonated content. All that soda and pizza mixing in her tummy conceived gas bubbles that pushed through her throat and parted her lips.

“*BBBEEEEEEELLLLLCCCCCCCCHHHHH!*” Christa was caught off guard by the bombastic burp that boomed out of her mouth. It was so powerful that it sent ripples across all the fat on her body and blew Andy William’s hair back. The eructation reeked of digested pizza, Coke, stomach acid, and the feast that the girls had eaten when the meeting started and lasted for five seconds. When it finished, Christina blushed and covered her mouth with both hand in embarrassment. “Oh my, excuse me!”

Andy just stared at her bug-eyed. “Wow, I didn’t think that a woman could burp that loud.”

Christa giggled. “Hah, that was nothing. You should hear Brandi’s belches. She would literally blow you away.”

Andy was simultaneously scared and enthralled by this information. “Well, I’d be interested in checking that out some time, but for now, let’s help you finish this food.”

“You read my mind.”

Therefore, the process repeated itself. Andrew helped Christa shovel down pizza; at one point, she even rolled up an entire pie and swallowed it whole. After the other 13 pizzas were devoured, Christa pounded down the second soda bottle and ended the 30-minute-long binge with an even bigger belch. By now, her belly had swollen into a completely spherical shape and Andy could not help but gaze at it with admiration as it rode up her blue t-shirt and covered her pink skirt.

“Can you aid my digestion with a good tummy rub?” She asked in a deliberately cute tone. “It’ll help it go faster and make me coax some really big burps.”

Andy meekly accepted and began messaging her glorious gut. His tiny hands felt heavenly on her taut skin. All the while she blasted out enormous eructations that were starting to make the room smell. Thankfully, it had excellent ventilation. Eventually, Christa decided to say something else personal to her impromptu masseuse.

“Andy, I have get get something off my chest. I joined this group because people mocked me for being too big, but ironically, now I feel so small compared to them. ” She explained, her voice starting to waver. “They’re all SSBBWs and I’m barely a BBW.”

“Don’t sell yourself short, Christa.” Andy said. “You’re a great person. You help represent people who most people don’t care about, and I’m positive that the people in your organization love and respect you. And as for the weight, once all of this food is digested, you’ll probably outweigh Maria at least.”

Touched by these words, Christa began tearing up. Without warning, she grabbed Andrew and enveloped him in a squishy hug. “Thank you, Andy.”

This embraced lasted for while, until some people entered the room.

“Okay, yeah, I'm a little curious too. You can do some ass blasting.”

Maria hopped off down the street into the screaming populace, each of them no bigger than Barbie dolls to her.

“Alright, here goes!”
